meanings.definition: To treat or combine with iodine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will iodinate the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: She iodinates the water to make it safe for drinking.
meanings.sent3: I decided to iodinate my salad with a sprinkle of iodine for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: The iodinated solution seeped into the cracks, disinfecting the entire surface.
meanings.sent5: After the storm, they iodinated the water supply to ensure it was clean.

meanings.definition: To introduce iodine into a compound.
meanings.sent1: The chemist will iodinate the mixture to test for the presence of iodine.
meanings.sent2: They iodinate the solution to observe the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent3: The students accidentally iodinated the wrong beaker, creating a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: The iodinated compound glowed under the UV light, revealing its composition.
meanings.sent5: Adding iodine to the mixture will iodinate it, changing its properties.
